title: PS VITA Tokyo Hanadu (Decrypted)
description:
The first decrypted game for the PS VITA (Hopefully there will be more on the way)

IT NEEDS A PS VITA WITH FW 3.60 AND WITH HENKAKU INSTALLED

DETAILS HERE:https://henkaku.xyz/

Now for the game:

This torrent includes the data file
and the vpk.
The data file is zipped within the zip file, you will have to
extract that zip later.
HOW TO INSTALL:
1. You must have Henkaku installed on your PSVITA (Currently
only supports fw 3.60).
2. You are required to have an ftp client installed on your PC, I
recommend Filezilla.
3. Open up Vitashell and press SELECT, note the server address
prompted on your screen.
4. Open your ftp client and connect to the address shown on
screen.
5. Create a directory in /ux0: (Example: /ux0:/VPK)
6. Copy the vpk to that directory.
7. Disconnect the FTP server by pressing CIRCLE and navigate to
your VPK directory on your Vita.
8. Install xanadu0.vpk
9. Once finished installing, press SELECT again and reconnect to
the server via your FTP client.
10. Navigate to /ux0:/app/PCSG00608
11. Extract data files to the directory via your FTP client.
12. Launch the game
